topics.body:
Two things to start off.

1) I find Markiplier to be meh. He's funny, but to me, it kinda seems like he fakes most of his reactions. I saw his FNaF playthrough, and while it was amusing [spoiler]and awesome to see him beat 20/20/20/20 mode[/spoiler], I feel like he overreacts way too much for his own good. It doesn't exactly convince me.

2) I'M LEGALIZING EVERYTHING

"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545a08446368725acfa70100#post_545a08446368725acfa70100
Critical hits are terrible when a shiny Pokemon is involved.
